name: War in the Pacific: The Struggle Against Japan 1941-1945
name_original: War in the Pacific: The Struggle Against Japan 1941-1945
description:
War in the Pacific: The Struggle Against Japan 1941-1945 is a strategy game developed by 2by3 Games. It was originally released in 2004. Matrix Games published the game.
You can play War in the Pacific: The Struggle Against Japan 1941-1945 on PC.
